subject: Re: [junit] Counting assertions
msgSnippet: ... Can you give some more detail on your goal?  Read naively (as I so often do), this makes it sound like you have a business goal of producing X number of
messageBody:
Phlip wrote:

> JUniters:
>
> These posts discuss adding a count of assertions to
> each run:
>
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/message/1329
>
> This feature is very useful for a burn-up chart in a
> legacy code situation.

Can you give some more detail on your goal? Read naively (as I so often
do), this makes it sound like you have a business goal of producing X
number of assertions. Is that right?

David Saff
